transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi sir, very good afternoon. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ek theek hai.
Executive: Sir, main actually IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, senior manager. Aapke catalog se related discussion karne ke liye call kiya tha sir. Maine abhi baat ho payegi aapse?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Actually sir last aapke na aapse discussion hua tha aapke account manager ka. To waha pe na aapne jo feedback jata hai aapke paas whatsapp pe, waha pe aapne unko not satisfy mark kiya tha sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To main aapse janna chahti, main keh rahi thi aapki side se sir hume feedback receive hua hai not satisfy ka. Last call jo bhi aapke paas gayi hai uske baad na aapke paas whatsapp par ek feedback gaya hoga satisfy or not satisfy ka. Waha pe aapne not satisfy mark kiya hai. To main janna chah rahi thi sir ki kya issue hai? Account manager ke saath koi issue hai aapka jiske liye aapne. Haan account manager Sudhanshu wahi tha, bol do.
Executive: Haan ji Sudhanshu ji hi hain aapke account manager.
Customer: Haan wahi hai.
Executive: Haan to unse koi issue hai aapko?
Customer: Haan issue hai na.
Executive: To bataiye kya dikkat aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Aisa mera last time jo gaya hai abhi mere ko 25 10 saal se main aapke company mein juda abhi mere ko last year tak 66 paisa bharaya 65000 aur 5 kilo 10 kilo ka mere ko abhi ye buyer denge to kaha se abhi wo bolta hai din me chura main kaha mere ko nahi karwana hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: 5 10 kilo unko bol bol ke ek do saal se main bolta hua 2024 se mera management kar raha hai unko bolo meri complaint abhi tak relating aur kab se mere ko phone kar rahe hai main kaha mere ko close kar do. Nahi karna rehna mujhe IndiaMART ka. Achha.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai dekhiye aapko renewal nahi karana hai that is secondary matter sir but matlab wo aapko waise to services mein help karte hain na sir. Aapka account hai.
Customer: Kya help karta hai unko to baat hi nahi hai. Do saal se mere ko de dete na do saal se mere ko buyer de dete na.
Executive: Hmm. Actually matlab main aapka na yaha pe thik hai aapki baat sahi hai but main yaha pe dekh rahi thi ki unhone aapka shayad group wagera bhi create kiya hua hai jaha pe wo aapko by lead share karte hain. Hai na? Waise main ek cheez aapse puchna chahungi, koi issue nahi. Main aapse ek cheez puchna chahungi sir. Hum sirf ye Umargam Gujarat mein deal karte hain ya fir hum abhi pan India mein deal kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Saari jagah karte hain na.
Executive: Aap pan India mein deal karte hain aur minimum aapko 500 ki requirement chahiye hoti hai na sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achha achha. Thik hai sir dekhiye main aapko wahi cheez main aapko bol rahi hu ki hum apne side se na puri koshish karte hain ki hum aapko kuch by leads na aapke jo minimum aapke jo order quantity hai jo aapka minimum requirement hai hum uske according aapko by lead share kare. Thik hai. IndiaMART ke level par jitni bhi by lead aati hai balki jo bhi aapka requirement se match karta hai wo aapko definitely jayegi hi jayegi uske liye hum mana nahi kar rahe hain lekin kai bari aisa hota hai sir ki jo aapki abhi requirement hai 500 500 kg ki ya fir 500 pieces ki wo kai bari sir requirements na aati nahi hai. IndiaMART par bhi bahut aisa hota hai ki wo requirement post nahi ho paati hai utni kyuki jab tak buyer hume requirement nahi dalega uske according hum aapko wo by lead share nahi kar payenge. Abhi agar aap mere se baat kar rahe hain aur abhi aap mujhse kahenge na main aapko 25 kg 15 kg 10 kg aise main aapko multiples by lead share kar sakti hu. Thik hai. But abhi mere paas actually kya hai ki. Haan kar sakte ho to fir mere ko ye abhi nahi karna hai na abhi bahut ho gaya na abhi mere ko utna assessment to nahi karna hai na fir mere ko fir wo nahi rehna hai na fir.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir hum aapko us cheez ke liye force bilkul bhi nahi karenge actually kya hai ki abhi na market competition bhi bahut jyada ho rakha hai sir. Agar main genuinely batau main aapka yaha pe market competition dekh rahi thi soya wax mein to aap dekhoge 500 se jyada plus product available hai yaha pe sirf soya wax mein aur aap nahi manenge sir yaha pe already multiples aise supplier hai jo sirf hamare yaha par premium services use kar rahe hain like aapka star leader. To kai bari aisa hota hai ki jab market competition aapka badhta hai na to waha par na buyer hum to reach nahi kar pate hain so quality of buyer hote hain kyuki already sir dekhiye market ka yahi rule hai ki jo jo market mein dikhta hai wahi bikta hai. Jitni achi aapki visibility bani rahegi jitni jyada aapka promotions hoga market mein top par aapko jyada se jyada buyer approach karenge. Right? To aapka bas wahi hai ki aap apna activation jaisa hai aap waisa apna highly activation rahiye aap check karte rahiye by lead jaise hi aapko by lead 500 ki ya fir aapne requirement ke according aapko dikhti hai aap usko consume kariye. Hum bhi idhar se aapko bhejne ka try kar rahe hain sir ki aapko jo bhi aapki requirement hai 500 pieces ki 500 kg ki wo aapko mil jaye. Thik hai. Baki unhone aapko suggest hi kiya hoga sir ki jyada agar aap TrustSeal mein nahi karwana chah rahe ho to aap basic mein karwa lo yahi suggest kiya hoga unhone aapko. Hum aapko force nahi kar sakte bas hum aapko suggest kar sakte hain sir ki aap karwa sakte hain agar aapka man agar aapko lag raha hai ki ha mujhe as a listing rakhni hai kyuki aaj aap samajhte ho sir aaj kal ke generation mein market competition aur listing jo online visibility hai wo bahut jyada matter kar rahi hai abhi filhal. Right? To is wajah se unhone aapko suggest kiya hoga baki agar aapko lag raha hai ki aapka aapko iska suggestion bhi nahi chahiye to koi dikkat nahi hai main unko mana kar deti hu ki aapko us cheez ke liye force nahi kare. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai. Haan.
Executive: Haan baki aap dekhiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting buyleads as per requirement.

- Wants to close IndiaMART subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about market competition.

- Executive assured no force for TrustSeal.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform account manager to not force.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, trustseal, account manager
